snippet: FORMAN--June Schwartz, 92, died March 9, surrounded by her loving family. Daughter of Jessie and Joseph, beloved wife of Harold of 73 years, cherished mother of Jane Forman (Edward Wolff) and Nancy Leader-Cramer (Andrew), adored grandmother of Spencer, Ashley (Manuel), Alix and Diana (Seth). Forever in our hearts. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FORMAN--June Schwartz, 92, died March 9, surrounded by her loving family. Daughter of Jessie and Joseph, beloved wife of Harold of 73 years, cherished mother of Jane Forman (Edward Wolff) and Nancy Leader-Cramer (Andrew), adored grandmother of Spencer, Ashley (Manuel), Alix and Diana (Seth). Forever in our hearts. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FORMAN, JUNE SCHWARTZ
